column5: description
Chromosome/Contig
Begin of feature (0 based - half open)
End of feature (0 based - half open)
Type of feature (snp,del,ins,...)
Reference sequence, can be a number for large features
Alternative sequence, can be a number for large features
name of feature
Quality score of feature
Filter value
allele present on first chromosome/haplotype
allele present on second chromosome/haplotype
sequenced status: v = variant, r = reference (i.e. not this variant), u = unsequenced

Zygosity status: m = homozygous, t = heterozygous, r = reference, o = other variant, v = variant but genotype unspecified, c = compound (i.e. genotype has this variant and other variant), u = unsequenced
Phased status: 0 if not phased, other integer if phased
Genotypes
List of Phred-scaled genotype likelihoods
Number of high-quality bases
Phred-scaled strand bias P-value
reference only value of: Allelic depths (high-quality bases)
alleles only values of: Allelic depths (high-quality bases)
reference only value of: Allelic depths on the forward strand (high-quality bases)
alleles only values of: Allelic depths on the forward strand (high-quality bases)
reference only value of: Allelic depths on the reverse strand (high-quality bases)
alleles only values of: Allelic depths on the reverse strand (high-quality bases)
Phred-scaled Genotype Quality
Genotype posterior probabilities in the range 0 to 1
Indicates that the variant is an INDEL.
Maximum number of raw reads supporting an indel
Maximum fraction of raw reads supporting an indel
Raw read depth
Variant Distance Bias for filtering splice-site artefacts in RNA-seq data (bigger is better)
Mann-Whitney U-z test of Read Position Bias (closer to 0 is better)
Mann-Whitney U-z test of Mapping Quality Bias (closer to 0 is better)
Mann-Whitney U-z test of Base Quality Bias (closer to 0 is better)
Mann-Whitney U-z test of Mapping Quality vs Strand Bias (closer to 0 is better)
Mann-Whitney U-z test of Soft-Clip Length Bias (closer to 0 is better)
Phred-scaled p-value using Fisher's exact test to detect strand bias
Segregation based metric.
Fraction of MQ0 reads (smaller is better)
Allele count in genotypes for each ALT allele, in the same order as listed
Total number of alleles in called genotypes
Number of high-quality ref-forward , ref-reverse, alt-forward and alt-reverse bases
Average mapping quality
